item.title: Newsletter
item.description: Follow our mission to make the easiest and most fun Hugo starter for building modern websites.

item.title: Privacy Policy
item.description: TLDR: We do not use cookies and we do not collect any personal data. Website visitors No personal information is collected. No information is stored in the browser. No information is shared with, sent to or sold to third-parties. No information is shared with advertising companies. No information is mined and harvested for personal and behavioral trends. No information is monetized. Information we collect and what we use it for We run Plausible analytics on gethyas.
